articles.content: Graphic designer Monte Eady is a lifelong Bucks fan living in Milwaukee.So Eady designed a “Greek Freak” T-shirt last year to honor the Bucks’ Greece-born star, Giannis Antetokounmpo, for winning NBA… [+726 chars]

articles.title: U.S. Education Department Says Connecticut Must Ban Transgender Athletes or Risk Losing Federal Funding - Newsweek
